page.title: 07C M School Buildings
page.content: (Page provided by C M Primary School) In our school we have two playgrounds and a football pitch. There are two blocks of buildings. In the top block there are two classrooms and a classroom attached to a swimming pool. There are Girls and Boys toilets and changing rooms. In the bottom block there are three classrooms and a big dinner hall. At the back of the hall are the school kitchens where they serve our dinner at 12.10 pm. Some of us bring sandwiches or go home to dinner. This is an average meal - a choice of curry and rice,fishcake and peas or salad and potatoes. We also have a big Library, & an Art room with TV,Video and a computer. There are also two bike sheds and a garden with flowers,trees and a pond.
